title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       Visit our Photo Gallery for pictures of the rehabilitation of the former Monroe School becoming Brown v. Board of Education NHS and historic images of Topeka from 1879-1951. "The Road to Justice" on the Multimedia Presentations page is an interactive activity that allows you to think like an African American student in 1950.
